docs.snippet: Singapore's defence minister on Monday said the nine armoured vehicles seized in Hong Kong could not be detained or confiscated, but that he welcomed Hong Kong's pledge for the dispute to be handled in line with its laws....
docs.lead_paragraph: Singapore's defence minister on Monday said the nine armoured vehicles seized in Hong Kong could not be detained or confiscated, but that he welcomed Hong Kong's pledge for the dispute to be handled in line with its laws.

headline.main: Give Us Back Our Troop Carriers, Singapore Urges Hong Kong
headline.print_headline: Give Us Back Our Troop Carriers, Singapore Urges Hong Kong

docs.snippet: French police investigating the theft of nearly $10 million in jewels from Kim Kardashian arrested 17 people on Monday, including a chauffeur who drove the American reality television star around Paris in the days before the robbery....

headline.main: Kardashian Driver Among 17 Arrested in France Over Jewel Heist

docs.snippet: A Syrian truce brokered by Russia and Turkey was under growing strain on Monday as rebels vowed to respond to government violations and President Bashar al-Assad said the army would retake an important rebel-held area near Damascus....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Syrian truce brokered by Russia and Turkey was under growing strain on Monday as rebels vowed to respond to government violations and President Bashar al-Assad said the army would retake an important rebel-held area near Damascus.

headline.main: Syria Truce Under Strain; Assad Ready to Discuss 'Everything' at Talks
headline.print_headline: Syria Truce Under Strain; Assad Ready to Discuss 'Everything' at Talks

docs.snippet: At least seven policemen and one civilian were killed in a bomb attack on a checkpoint in the northern Sinai city of al-Arish on Monday, and five of the attackers were also killed, the Egyptian Interior Ministry said....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least seven policemen and one civilian were killed in a bomb attack on a checkpoint in the northern Sinai city of al-Arish on Monday, and five of the attackers were also killed, the Egyptian Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Seven Egyptian Police Killed in Sinai Bomb Attack
headline.print_headline: Seven Egyptian Police Killed in Sinai Bomb Attack

docs.snippet: Mourners from all walks of life in Iran — from the country's president to passers-by on the street — paid their respects on Monday to the late Iranian leader Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani following his death over the weekend at the age of 8...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mourners from all walks of life in Iran — from the country's president to passers-by on the street — paid their respects on Monday to the late Iranian leader Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani following his death over the weekend at the age of 82.

docs.snippet: Militants attacked an Egyptian police checkpoint in the northern Sinai Peninsula on Monday using a stolen garbage truck packed with explosives, killing at least eight people and setting off clashes with security forces, officials said....

headline.print_headline: Militants Attack Checkpoint in Egypt's Sinai, Killing 8

docs.snippet: Switzerland's central bank expects to post a profit of more than 24 billion Swiss francs (19.34 billion pounds) for 2016, it said on Monday, as it logged big gains from its foreign currency holdings and its negative interest rate policy....

docs.snippet: State-run Chinese tabloid Global Times warned U.S. President-elect Donald Trump that China would "take revenge" if he reneged on the one-China policy, only hours after Taiwan's president made a controversial stopover in Houston....
docs.lead_paragraph: State-run Chinese tabloid Global Times warned U.S. President-elect Donald Trump that China would "take revenge" if he reneged on the one-China policy, only hours after Taiwan's president made a controversial stopover in Houston.

headline.main: Chinese State Tabloid Warns Trump, End One China Policy and China Will Take Revenge
